Package sx.blah.discord.handle.impl.events

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AudioPlayEvent
    This event is fired when an audio stream starts to play from the bot.
    AudioQueuedEvent
    This event is fired when audio is queued on the AudioChannel
    AudioReceiveEvent
    This event is dispatched when audio is received.
    AudioStopEvent
    This event is fired when an audio stream stops to playing from the bot.
    AudioUnqueuedEvent
    This event is fired when audio is unqueued from the AudioChannel
    ChannelCreateEvent
    This event is dispatched when a channel is created.
    ChannelDeleteEvent
    This event is dispatched when a channel is deleted.
    ChannelUpdateEvent
    This event is dispatched when a channel's information is updated.
    DiscordDisconnectedEvent
    This event is dispatched when either the client loses connection to discord or is logged out.
    GameChangeEvent
    This event is dispatched when the game a user is playing is changed.
    GuildCreateEvent
    This event is dispatched when a guild is created/ the bot joins the guild.
    GuildLeaveEvent
    This event is dispatched when a guild is deleted or the bot is kicked.
    GuildTransferOwnershipEvent
    This event is dispatched when a guild's ownership is transferred.
    GuildUnavailableEvent
    This event is dispatched when a guild becomes unavailable.
    GuildUpdateEvent
    This event is dispatched when a guild is edited by its owner.
    InviteReceivedEvent
    This event is dispatched when a message the bot receives includes an invite link.
    MentionEvent
    This event is dispatched whenever the bot is @mentioned.
    MessageAcknowledgedEvent
    This event is dispatched when this bot's account acknowledges a message.
    MessageDeleteEvent
    This event is dispatched whenever a message is deleted.
    MessageReceivedEvent
    This event is dispatched whenever a message is received.
    MessageSendEvent
    This event is dispatched whenever a message is sent by the bot.
    MessageUpdateEvent
    This event is dispatched whenever a message is edited.
    ModuleDisabledEvent
    This event is dispatched when a module is disabled.
    ModuleEnabledEvent
    This event is dispatched when a module is enabled.
    PresenceUpdateEvent
    This event is dispatched when a user changes his/her presence.
    ReadyEvent
    This event is dispatched when the bot is ready to interact with the api.
    RoleCreateEvent
    This event is dispatched whenever a role is created.
    RoleDeleteEvent
    This event is dispatched after a role has been deleted from a guild.
    RoleUpdateEvent
    This event is dispatched whenever a guild role is modified.
    TypingEvent
    This event is dispatched if a user is typing.
    UserBanEvent
    This event is dispatched when a user is banned from a guild.
    UserJoinEvent
    This is dispatched when a user is added/joins a guild.
    UserLeaveEvent
    This event is dispatched when a guild member is removed/leaves from a guild
    UserPardonEvent
    This event is dispatched when a user is pardoned from a ban.
    UserRoleUpdateEvent
    This event is dispatched when a guild updates a user's roles.
    UserUpdateEvent
    This is dispatched whenever a user updates his/her info
    UserVoiceStateUpdateEvent
    This is dispatched when the voice state of a user is updated.
    VoiceChannelCreateEvent
    This event is dispatched when a voice channel is created.
    VoiceChannelDeleteEvent
    This event is dispatched when a voice channel is deleted.
    VoiceChannelUpdateEvent
    This event is dispatched when a voice channel is updated.
    VoiceDisconnectedEvent
    This event is dispatched when either the client loses connection to discord or is logged out.
    VoicePingEvent
    This event is dispatched when a voice heartbeat is received.
    VoiceUserSpeakingEvent
    This is dispatched when a user starts or stops speaking
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DiscordDisconnectedEvent.Reason
    This enum represents the possible reasons for discord being disconnected.
    VoiceDisconnectedEvent.Reason
    This enum represents the possible reasons for discord being disconnected.
